00021 #include "../boost/xint/nothrow_integer.hpp"

00023 namespace boost {
00024 namespace xint {

00026 using namespace detail;
00027 
00035 std::string to_string(const nothrow_integer& n, size_t base, bool uppercase) {
00036     try {
00037         return detail::to_string(n, base, uppercase);
00038     } catch (std::exception&) {
00039         return std::string();
00040     }
00041 }
00042 
00047 nothrow_integer nothrow_from_string(const std::string& str, size_t base) {
00048     try {
00049         if (str==detail::nan_text) return nothrow_integer::nan();
00050 
00051         nothrow_integer r;
00052         detail::from_string(r, str, base);
00053         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00054     } catch (std::exception&) {
00055         return nothrow_integer::nan();
00056     }
00057 }
00058 
00060 nothrow_integer nothrow_from_binary(const xint::binary_t& b, size_t bits) {
00061     try {
00062         nothrow_integer r;
00063         detail::from_binary(r, b, bits);
00064         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00065     } catch (std::exception&) {
00066         return nothrow_integer::nan();
00067     }
00068 }
00069 
00074 xint::binary_t to_binary(const nothrow_integer& n, size_t bits) {
00075     try {
00076         xint::binary_t r;
00077         detail::to_binary(r, n, bits);
00078         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00079     } catch (std::exception&) {
00080         return xint::binary_t();
00081     }
00082 }

00084 } // namespace xint
